text: Belsentes is a commune of the Ardèche department, in the southern part of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of Nonières (the seat) and Saint-Julien-Labrousse.Arrêté préfectoral 12 December 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Ardèche
title: Belsentes
